title: Directors of finance and commerce and consumer affairs; fees
context: §92-24 Directors of finance and commerce and consumer affairs; fees. Except as provided in section 91-2.5, the director of finance and the director of commerce and consumer affairs each shall charge the following fees: (1) For administering any oath, $1; (2) For preparing every photostat copy of any document on record in the director&rsquo;s office, 50 cents per page or portion thereof; (3) For preparing every typewritten copy of any document on record in the director&rsquo;s office, 50 cents per page or portion thereof; (4) For preparing a certificate of compliance, $5 for the original certificate, and $1 for each additional copy thereof, of which $4 from each certificate and 75 cents of each additional copy shall be deposited in the compliance resolution fund established pursuant to section 26-9(o); (5) For comparing any document submitted for certification, 15 cents per page or portion thereof; (6) For certifying any document on record in the director&rsquo;s office, 25 cents for each certification; (7) For all other acts and duties, the fees of which are not otherwise provided for, such charges as each may from time to time prescribe. [CC 1859, §690; RL 1925, §1253; RL 1935, §2212; RL 1945, §5813; am L 1949, c 172, §1; RL 1955, §132-14; am L Sp 1959 2d, c 1, §§14, 15; am L 1963, c 114, §§1, 3; HRS §92-24; am L 1983, c 153, §1; am L 1988, c 141, §9; gen ch 1993; am L 1999, c 129, §4 and c 301, §3(2)]
